p: This work was supported by researchers from the University of Guelph, located on the ancestral and treaty lands of the Attawandaron people and Mississaugas of the Credit; the Labrador Institute, located on the lands of the Innu and Inuit of Labrador; and the University of Alberta, located on Treaty 6 territory, traditional lands of First Nations and MÃ©tis people. We would like to thank participants of the community-based monitoring workshops - which several of the authors attended - for their invaluable insight. We would also like to thank Dr. Mark Andrachuk for providing his suggestions of CBM programs and support throughout the writing of this paper. Additionally, we would like to acknolwedge the anonymous reviewers for their incredibly valuable feedback.
